original_text: And when he would have put him to death, he feared the multitude, because they counted him as a prophet.
korean_text: 헤롯이 요한을 죽이려 하되 무리가 그를 선지자로 여기므로 그들을 두려워하더니

sentences.original_text: And when he would have put him to death
because they counted him as a prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 그를 예언자로 여겼기 때문이다
